column3: Can you tell me who you are? And help me to go to the next location
Hi! I’m the Chauvet Cave. You can call me Chauvet for short.
I’m here to serve as a guard on the fragment of the gem. By the way, who are you?
I’m Ethel. I just wanna get the gem of wit for me to know myself.
So please let me pass this level so that I can the fragment
